io.reinert.requestor.core

Class RequestDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.reinert.requestor.core.RequestDispatcher
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XhrRequestDispatcher

    public abstract class RequestDispatcher
extends Object
    This class dispatches the requests and return promises.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleRun

        public abstract void scheduleRun(Runnable runnable,
                                 int delay)
        Defers the execution of a Runnable by the informed delay. This method is used to schedule the dispatches.
        Parameters:
        runnable - A callback to be executed later
        delay - The time to postpone the runnable execution

      • send

        protected abstract <R> void send(PreparedRequest request,
                                 Deferred<R> deferred,
                                 PayloadType responsePayloadType)
        Sends the request through the wire and resolves (or rejects) the deferred when completed. The success result must be a instance of #entityType.

        Implementations must execute an HTTP Request with given values and resolve/reject the deferred when the request is finished. It is recommended that progress events be sent to Deferred.notifyDownload(RequestProgress) and Deferred.notifyUpload(RequestProgress).

        All possible exceptions should be caught and sent to Deferred.reject(RequestException) wrapped in a RequestException or any of its children. This will avoid breaking code flow when some exception occurs.
        Type Parameters:
        R - The expected type of the request
        Parameters:
        request - The request to be sent
        deferred - The deferred to resolve or reject when completed
        responsePayloadType - The type of the expected response payload

      • evalResponse

        protected final void evalResponse(RawResponse response)
        Evaluates the response and resolves the deferred. This method must be called by implementations after the response is received.
        Parameters:
        response - The response received from the request

      • dispatch

        public <T> PollingRequest<T> dispatch(MutableSerializedRequest request,
                                      PayloadType responsePayloadType)
        Sends the request and return an instance of Request expecting a sole result.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected type in response payload
        Parameters:
        request - The built request
        responsePayloadType - The class instance of the expected type in response payload
        Returns:
        The request for the dispatched request

      • dispatch

        public <T> void dispatch(MutableSerializedRequest request,
                         boolean skipAuth,
                         DualCallback callback)
        Sends the request with the respective callback bypassing request processing and polling.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected type of the response payload
        Parameters:
        request - The built request
        callback - The callback to be executed when done
